Posts.Content: Hi I've just had my last of six chemos one week ago I've to get my lymph nodes out in January as they showed to be cancerous after my mastectomy Â in August got to get radio therapy aswell in feb so been throo the mill this year but you can get throo this don't treat yourself as if your I'll be strong and you'll get there it just takes one strep at a time all the best for the new year good luck xx
Posts.Title: Just joined the roller coaster - help !
